item.title: Half-Day Thoroughbred Horse Farm Tour in Kentucky
item.description: Discover the heart and soul of Kentucky’s beautiful Bluegrass horse country on this guided, 3-hour, small-group tour. Get a behind-the-scenes look at the thoroughbred horse lifestyle as you explore the famous Keeneland Race Course and one or more thoroughbred horse farms. Learn about the history of racing and how Lexington became the epicenter of thoroughbred breeding in the United States. Note: itinerary may change depending on availability.

image.alt: Half-Day Thoroughbred Horse Farm Tour in Kentucky

item.title: Unique Horse Farm Tours with Insider Access to Private Farms
item.description: Kentucky is renowned for its horse programs and farms, this is your chance to see the prestigious facilities up close. Tour area horse farms—some that are usually closed to the public—to get a look at the work that goes into raising and caring for thoroughbreds. The tour includes time to meet and interact with the horses, maybe even feed them their favorite peppermint treats.

image.alt: Unique Horse Farm Tours with Insider Access to Private Farms

item.title: Walking Food Tour Downtown Lexington
item.description: Get to know the charms of Lexington as you eat your way through the Kentucky city’s downtown on this walking food tour. You’ll learn all about the history and culture of the “Horse Capital of the World” as your guide shares insights about the landmarks you pass. The tour will make five stops and includes food ranging from traditional Kentucky specialties to modern innovations.

image.alt: Walking Food Tour Downtown Lexington

item.title: Fully Guided Zipline Canopy Tour through Kentucky River Palisades
item.description: Experience an otherwise unseen area of Central Kentucky on this guided zipline tour. See the deep limestone gorges, spring-fed creeks, and old growth trees of the Kentucky River Palisades as you fly high overhead. Plus, learn about the region's early settlers and local history. The course features a series of six ziplines, three suspension bridges, a floating staircase, and a rappel.

image.alt: Fully Guided Zipline Canopy Tour through Kentucky River Palisades

item.title: Bites of the Bluegrass Cocktails & Bites Tour
item.description: Taste your way through the East End of Lexington and learn about local lore with the help of a tour guide passionate about the neighborhood’s best food and drink. On this 2.5-hour tour, the group leader will share some of their own favorite watering holes, and you can eat like a real Lexingtonian.

image.alt: Bites of the Bluegrass Cocktails & Bites Tour

item.title: Distillery District Food & History Tour in Lexington
item.description: Spend a fun-filled three hours in Lexington’s historic Distillery District with a local foodie guide who’ll help you taste your way through town. Learn all about the history of the city and its culture as you sample everything from expertly blended cocktails to Kentucky staple burgoo stew. And for dessert, you’ll try some award-winning ice cream.

image.alt: Distillery District Food & History Tour in Lexington

item.title: Lexington's Art Walk Tour
item.description: This is Lexington's ONLY Art Tour where you can enjoy the lively and vibrant local culture by connecting with the local eclectic arts scene. Fun and well-informed guides will lead you on a tour through the downtown district, introducing you to some of our many murals, public artworks and sculptures along the way while pointing out historic buildings and sharing entertaining stories that will keep you engaged. You will check out several galleries and exhibitions with a brief overview of work on display before ending this leisurely walk at Artists’ Attic – a 22 artists’ studio cooperative – where drinks and refreshments will be waiting. Here you will be able to watch artists at work and chat with them about their creative process.

image.alt: Lexington's Art Walk Tour

item.title: Behind the Scenes Thoroughbred Tour
item.description: No horse lover’s trip to Kentucky is complete with a behind-the-scenes tour of the Thoroughbred Center. Take an exclusive look at where thoroughbred race horses are trained and housed on a 230-acre property of classic Kentucky Bluegrass. Learn more about thoroughbreds and even see their training sessions in action as you tour the center with a guide.

image.alt: Behind the Scenes Thoroughbred Tour

item.title: 2-Hour Guided Walking Art and Appetizers Tour in Lexington
item.description:
This is a fun tour especially designed for art and foodie lovers. You will start with a visit to the unique Artists' Attic space, studio home to over 20 artists, then continue through downtown Lexington where you'll see and learn about the many arts features and landmarks as well as hear entertaining stories from your lively guide.
The tour will then end in the lounge of 21c Museum Hotel with appetizers and the opportunity to buy a drink from the bar. A fun time to socialize and make new friends while surrounded by the hotel's amazing contemporary art collection and enjoying fabulous finger food.

image.alt: 2-Hour Guided Walking Art and Appetizers Tour in Lexington

item.title: Triple Crown Experience
item.description: This is our most requested tour! We've curated 3 unique venues that we believe highlight the best that Kentucky has to offer. With the help of one of our experienced guides, your group will experience Central Kentucky’s famous bourbon, wine and thoroughbred industries first hand - all in one day.

image.alt: Triple Crown Experience

item.title: Daniel Boone's Challenge: an Adventure in the Trees
item.description: Daniel Boone Challenge is an Aerial Adventure in the trees, a great confidence builder for young and old, families and groups are welcome. The course is in a spectacular setting at Boone Creek Outdoors and is a chance to challenge your senses and experience the outdoors!

image.alt: Daniel Boone's Challenge: an Adventure in the Trees

item.title: 3 Hour Walking Food & Haunted History Tour in Lexington
item.description: Join us on an unforgettable journey through Lexington's haunted history! We'll visit some of the city's most infamous haunted sites to share the chilling tales of restless spirits and unexplained phenomena that have plagued these locales for centuries. Uncover the secrets preserved in historic buildings, spirits and dead bodies at Gratz Park, and murder cases that remain unsolved, even today. As we go, we'll savor local cuisine and cocktails for a truly unique experience that will leave you dying to come back!

image.alt: 3 Hour Walking Food & Haunted History Tour in Lexington

item.title: Guided Half Day Tour in Lexington
item.description:
Come with us as we explore 3 of Lexington's premier craft distilleries. Perfect for the group that needs entertaining for a few short hours, we'll transport you from distillery to distillery to learn about both beer and bourbon. Each guest will receive a guided tasting of different spirits at each location.
This is not a private experience, must bring a valid 21+ ID.

image.alt: Guided Half Day Tour in Lexington

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Lexington by Operation City Quest
item.description: The Lexington scavenger hunt players will use an app to find objects around the city to collect points, and complete fun challenges for points. Players will be able to see their score live on the app rankings. All our Scavenger hunts have a live remote host to help along the way. Come and explore with us in Lexington.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Lexington by Operation City Quest

item.title: Full-Day Lexington Farm Tour with Clay Pigeon Shooting
item.description: Get a feel for life in the Bluegrass State during this small-group tour that combines a visit to three of Lexington's famed horse farms with an opportunity to shoot clay pigeons at a members-only venue, not usually open to the public. After a morning of clay target shooting, see some of the training facilities that make Kentucky such a legendary site for horse breeding and racing. Easy Lexington pickup is included.

image.alt: Full-Day Lexington Farm Tour with Clay Pigeon Shooting

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Giddyup Lexington’s Main Street!
item.description: Skip wasting time on generic city tours—instead, explore Lexington with your crew via scavenger hunt. Solving riddles, finding clues, and completing challenges, your smartphone will lead you across the city’s best landmarks, from Lexington Cemetery to Thoroughbred Park and beyond. As you explore this historic town, you’ll flex your imagination and detective skills for a gamified, only-in-Lexington adventure.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Giddyup Lexington’s Main Street!

item.title: Loco in Lexington, KY Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Loco in Lexington, KY Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Sound Bath Meditation in Lexington
item.description:
Discover a unique tranquil sanctuary while visiting Lexington with our immersive Sunday Sound Bath experience at The Sound Healing Center of Lexington.
Picture yourself reclined in comfort, surrounded by an atmosphere designed to transport you beyond relaxation. As you surrender to the experience, the facilitator skillfully weaves a tapestry of harmonious sounds using crystal singing bowls, rattles, drums, and more.
These carefully chosen frequencies create a symphony of healing vibrations that wash over you. This is a practice of pure receptivity - no effort, no expectations. It's an invitation to let go, allowing the gentle sound waves to dissolve tensions or worries.
The vibrations travel deep into your cells, releasing emotional knots and restoring the natural flow of energy. Don't miss the chance to partake in this transformative journey during your visit. Book your Sound Bath now and let the power of sound become a catalyst for your holistic wellness.

image.alt: Sound Bath Meditation in Lexington

item.title: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Lexington by Crazy Dash
item.description: Crazy Dash of Lexington is a great way to see the city! Use an app on your phone to submit photos of items you find around the city. Find them in any order you choose and submit a photo for points. You'll also complete challenges for points. See your score on the rankings compared to others who have played across the country when you are finished. All games have a remote host that will chat with you during the game. Crazy Dash is our most easy-going scavenger hunt. Come have some fun in Lexington today!

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Lexington by Crazy Dash

item.title: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Lexington by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Explore Lexington in a unique way with this app-led zombie survival quest. Follow the game to locate essential items, crucial for outlasting the impending zombie apocalypse. Earn points for each discovery and conquer entertaining zombie-themed challenges. Strategize to maximize points, prove your survival skills, and compete with friends in this survival challenge.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Lexington by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Lexington with Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Celebrate the magic of the season this year with Holly Jolly Hunt. Holly Jolly Hunt is an app based scavenger hunt that you can play anywhere of your choosing. Explore the city and look for holiday related items, both traditional and not so traditional. Take a photo through the app to score points for your scavenger hunt team. Perform fun, holiday challenges that will bring laughter to your team. See your score on the leaderboard compared to other teams from all over. Holly Jolly Hunt is guaranteed to provide lasting holiday memories. Whether you play with friends, family, or even co-workers, Holly Jolly will put a smile on your face for the rest of the year!

image.alt: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Lexington with Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Tasting Experience
item.description: Fresh Bourbon is the offering the newest, most unique Bourbon Tasting currently in Kentucky. We guide our guests through a full sensory tasting with food & aroma pairing, to help them explore and understand the complexities of Bourbon. You'll get hands on training from a professional local mixologists and build your own custom Old-Fashioned. Plus, historical tips, tricks and stories from the Bourbon world and an opportunity to explore more flavors through our seasonal craft cocktail menu. All of which are included in a dynamic tasting experience, in fact, the first Bourbon Tasting Experience in downtown Lexington, Kentucky!

image.alt: Tasting Experience
